languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар верой и правдой помогал Вольному Торговцу, видя в {mf|нем|ней} надежду на обретение Империумом защиты от ужасов вселенной. Все свои силы он бросил на подготовку новых экспедиций к Осколкам К'тан, но не успел поучаствовать ни в одной из них.
languages.translation_comment: Игрок подчинил Ктана, а Ксавьер согласился

languages.text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар верой и правдой помогал Вольному Торговцу, видя в {mf|нем|ней} надежду на обретение Империумом защиты от ужасов вселенной. Все свои силы он бросил на подготовку новых экспедиций к Осколкам К'тан, но не успел поучаствовать ни в одной из них.

traits.locale_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} a hope for protection against the horrors of the universe for the Imperium. His death is shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb says a lot. This great honour, apart from Rougue Traders, was bestowed only upon the most loyal servants, who saved their masters' life by giving away their own.

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} a hope for protection against the horrors of the universe for the Imperium. His death is shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb says a lot. This great honour, apart from Rougue Traders, was bestowed only upon the most loyal servants, who saved their masters' life by giving away their own.

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never had the chance to go on any of them.

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never had the chance to go on any of them.

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

languages.text: 大审判官希维尔·卡尔卡扎全心全意地协助行商浪人，认为{mf|他|她}正是帮助帝国抵御外敌的新希望。他决心将所有精力用来寻找新的星神碎片，但还没来得及踏上旅程，他的人生就结束了。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎审判长全心全意地协助行商浪人，认为{mf|他|她}正是帮助帝国抵御外敌的新希望。他决心将所有精力用来寻找新的星神碎片，但还没来得及踏上旅程，他的人生就结束了。

languages.text: Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar half {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu und loyal, denn er sah in {mf|ihm|ihr} eine Hoffnung, das Imperium vor all den Grauen des Universums schützen zu können. Er widmete all seine Energie der Organisation von Expeditionen, um neue C'tan-Fragmente zu finden. Selbst hatte er jedoch nie die Chance, auf eine solche Expedition zu gehen.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar half {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu und loyal, denn er sah in {mf|ihm|ihr} eine Hoffnung, das Imperium vor all den Grauen des Universums schützen zu können. Er widmete all seine Energie der Organisation von Expeditionen, um neue C'tan-Fragmente zu finden. Selbst hatte er jedoch nie die Chance, auf eine solche Expedition zu gehen.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar servit avec loyauté {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, voyant en {mf|lui|elle} un espoir de protéger l'Imperium contre les horreurs de l'univers. Il consacra toute son énergie à l'organisation d'expéditions dédiées à la recherche de nouvelles Échardes C'tan, mais n'eut jamais l'occasion de se joindre à elles.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar servit avec loyauté {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, voyant en {mf|lui|elle} un espoir de protéger l'Imperium contre les horreurs de l'univers. Il consacra toute son énergie à l'organisation d'expéditions dédiées à la recherche de nouvelles Échardes C'tan, mais n’eut jamais l’occasion de se joindre à elles.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar ayudó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con fidelidad y lealtad, al considerar su presencia una esperanza para la protección del Imperium frente a los horrores del universo. Dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a organizar expediciones en busca de nuevos fragmentos de C'tan, pero nunca tuvo la ocasión de participar personalmente.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar ayudó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con fidelidad y lealtad, al considerar su presencia una esperanza para la protección del Imperium frente a los horrores del universo. Dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a organizar expediciones en busca de nuevos fragmentos de C'tan, pero nunca tuvo la ocasión de participar personalmente.

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサル・ロード・インクィジターはローグトレーダーを忠実に助け、宇宙のあらゆる恐怖の中で帝国の保護に希望を見出した。彼は新たなク＝タン・シャードの探検に全精力を注いだが、そのいずれにも参加する機会はなかった。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサル・ロード・インクィジターはローグトレーダーを忠実に助け、宇宙のあらゆる恐怖の中で帝国の保護に希望を見出した。彼は新たなク＝タン・シャードの探検に全精力を注いだが、そのいずれにも参加する機会はなかった。

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, Hür Tacir'e inançla ve sadakatle hizmet etti. Onu, İmparatorluk'u evrenin dehşetlerinden koruyacak umut ışığı olarak görüyordu. Tüm enerjisini, yeni C'tan Parçaları bulmak üzere keşif seferleri düzenlemeye harcasa da onlarla yol alma fırsatı bulamadı.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar helped the Rogue Trader faithfully and loyally, seeing in {mf|him|her} hope for the Imperium's protection amidst all the horrors of the universe. He devoted all his energy to mounting expeditions for new C'tan Shards but never got the chance to go on any of them.

traits.locale_text: Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, Hür Tacir'e inançla ve sadakatle hizmet etti. Onu, evrenin dehşetlerine karşı İmparatorluk'u koruma umudu olan kişi olarak görüyordu. Tüm enerjisini, yeni C'tan Parçaları bulmak için yola çıkan keşif seferleri düzenleyerek geçirdi ama onlarla birlikte gitme şansı hiç olmadı.

languages.translation_comment: Игрок подчинил Ктана, а Ксавьер согласился
